articles.author: Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: European stocks set to fall sharply at open amid omicron vaccine fears - CNBC
articles.description: European stocks are expected to open sharply lower on Tuesday, with futures reversing themselves on new fears around the omicron Covid variant and vaccines.
articles.content:
LONDON European stocks are expected to open sharply lower on Tuesday, with futures reversing themselves on new fears around the omicron Covid variant and vaccines.
